channel.title: Question
channel.description:
well, i'm starting to make a server for my mates and using Battlescape as my base, and then i was wondering if its possible i could use PI's client on battlescape source.
If so.
How would i do that? could some1 explain me that
note; If wrong section, plz move..or tell me
